content: I was misled by the same notion. But in the last few months I have filled my life with a few small routines. Like practising the Piano. Reading. Workout. Even a single episode of Seinfeld during dinner. The results are starting to show, and I feel great! If it’s something you love, routine isn’t bad at all. The internet celebrates and captures extraordinary results, but not the million ordinary steps it took to get there. Top piece, thank you!
